ground_truth: Lightning flashes behind a skull-shaped cloud as it moves forward over the City of London, casting stormy reflections on a tall office building, where staff watch in alarm as the menacing clouds approach. The clouds produce three dark trails of smoke that swoop toward the Thames and Trafalgar Square, then swiftly move past Leicester Square tube station, down narrow alleys and through walls into Diagon Alley, igniting a shop and injuring people, as Death Eaters leave holding a man with a bag over his head. Two wear metal masks, while the third has a long face and beard. They zoom away and weave over the Millennium Bridge, which tilts, sways, and ultimately crashes into the Thames, flinging people and leaving only trails of smoke rising from the river. At Surbiton Railway Station, a pretty waitress smiles at Harry Potter, whose bloodied face appears as he puts down a paper, sniffs his breath, pops a mint into his mouth, and watches a train pass. Wiping condensation from the glass, his eyes fix on the opposite platform where he sees Professor Dumbledore standing in front of a Divine Magic Perfume billboard. Harry smiles, crosses over, and holds Dumbledore's left arm, noticing his blackened hand and rings as they spin away to a street. Dumbledore, with his left arm around Harry, leads him through a crowd of photographers flashing their cameras, and as they walk past a market cross, they continue down a dark street, stopping outside a detached house.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description:
Certainly! Here's the transformed text with exact synonyms replacing the non-stop-words:

Lightning flickers behind a skull-shaped vapor as it progresses forward over the City of London, casting tempestuous reflections on a lofty office edifice, where personnel observe in trepidation as the threatening clouds approach. The vapors generate three dark trails of smoke that dive toward the Thames and Trafalgar Square, then rapidly move beyond Leicester Square tube station, down narrow passages and through walls into Diagon Alley, igniting a shop and injuring individuals, as Death Eaters depart clutching a figure with a sack over his head. Two wear metallic masks, while the third has a elongated visage and beard. They race away and weave over the Millennium Bridge, which inclines, sways, and ultimately collapses into the Thames, flinging individuals and leaving only trails of smoke ascending from the river. At Surbiton Railway Station, a attractive waitress grins at Harry Potter, whose bloodied countenance appears as he puts down a newspaper, sniffs his breath, pops a mint into his mouth, and observes a train pass. Wiping moisture from the glass, his eyes fix on the opposite platform where he sees Professor Dumbledore standing in front of a Divine Magic Perfume billboard. Harry grins, crosses over, and holds Dumbledore's left arm, noticing his blackened hand and rings as they spin away to a street. Dumbledore, with his left arm around Harry, guides him through a crowd of photographers flashing their cameras, and as they walk past a market cross, they continue down a dim avenue, halting outside a detached residence.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Behind a skull-shaped cloud, lightning is flashed as it is moved forward over the City of London, and stormy reflections are cast on a tall office building by it, where the menacing clouds are watched in alarm by staff as they approach. Three dark trails of smoke are produced by the clouds, swooping toward the Thames and Trafalgar Square, then swiftly passing by Leicester Square tube station, down narrow alleys and through walls into Diagon Alley. A shop is ignited, and people are injured as a man with a bag over his head is left holding by Death Eaters. Metal masks are worn by two, while a long face and beard is had by the third. The Millennium Bridge is zoomed over and woven by them, which is tilted, sways, and ultimately is crashed into the Thames, flinging people and leaving only trails of smoke rising from the river. At Surbiton Railway Station, Harry Potter is smiled at by a pretty waitress, as his bloodied face is appeared when a paper is put down, his breath is sniffed, a mint is popped into his mouth, and a train is watched passing by him. Condensation is wiped from the glass, and his eyes are fixed on the opposite platform where Professor Dumbledore is seen by him standing in front of a Divine Magic Perfume billboard. Harry smiles, crosses over, and Dumbledore's left arm is held by him, noticing as they spin away to a street his blackened hand and rings. With his left arm around Harry, Dumbledore leads him through a crowd of photographers flashing their cameras, and past a market cross, they walk and continue down a dark street, stopping outside a detached house.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Lightning flashes behind a skull-shaped cloud advancing over London, casting reflections on a tall office building where alarmed staff observe. The clouds produce three dark smoke trails swooping toward the Thames and Trafalgar Square, swiftly passing Leicester Square tube station, navigating narrow alleys into Diagon Alley, igniting a shop and injuring people as Death Eaters leave with a man whose head is bagged. Two wear metal masks; the third has a long face and beard. They weave over the Millennium Bridge, which tilts, sways, and crashes into the Thames, flinging people and leaving smoke. At Surbiton Station, a waitress smiles at Harry Potter, who lowers a paper, sniffs his breath, pops a mint, and watches a train. Wiping condensation from the glass, he spots Professor Dumbledore by a Divine Magic Perfume billboard. Harry smiles, crosses over, and holds Dumbledore's blackened hand and rings as they spin away to a street. Dumbledore leads Harry through photographers, past a market cross, down a dark street, and they stop outside a house.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Lightning flashes behind a skull-shaped cloud over London, casting reflections on an office building where staff watch alarmed. Three dark smoke trails swoop toward the Thames, Trafalgar Square, and Leicester Square tube, then through walls into Diagon Alley, igniting a shop and injuring people. Death Eaters, with a man whose head is bagged, wear metal masks and a beard, zoom away over the Millennium Bridge, which crashes into the Thames, leaving smoke trails. At Surbiton Station, a waitress smiles at Harry Potter, who has a bloodied face, sniffs his breath, pops a mint, and sees Dumbledore by a Perfume billboard. Smiling, Harry holds Dumbledore's arm, noticing his blackened hand, as they spin away to a street. Dumbledore leads Harry through photographers to a dark street, stopping at a detached house.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: As lightning dramatically flashes in the skies, it illuminates a menacing skull-shaped cloud moving ominously over the bustling City of London. This eerie spectacle casts foreboding, stormy reflections upon the surface of a towering office building. Inside, anxious staff members peer out in alarm, watching the intimidating clouds approach with a sense of growing unease. The dark, foreboding clouds produce three sinister, smoky trails that swoop ominously toward the River Thames and the historic Trafalgar Square. They then swiftly sweep past the well-known Leicester Square tube station, snaking down narrow, shadowy alleys and phasing through solid walls into the magical Diagon Alley. Here, the chaos intensifies as they ignite a shop, causing injuries to unsuspecting people, while Death Eaters emerge, sinister and threatening, holding a captive man with a bag obscuring his head. Two Death Eaters ominously wear cold, metal masks, while the third, with a long, somber face and beard, adds to the menacing scene. The trio rapidly zooms away, skillfully weaving over the iconic Millennium Bridge, which begins to tilt precariously, sway violently, and ultimately crashes catastrophically into the River Thames below. This dramatic collapse flings people into the water, leaving only haunting trails of smoke rising from the disrupted river's surface. Meanwhile, at the quieter Surbiton Railway Station, an attractive waitress offers a charming smile to the world-famous Harry Potter. With a face notably marked by blood, Harry lowers his newspaper, sniffs his own breath as if checking it, then pops a mint into his mouth as he watches a train pass by. As he wipes away the condensation from the glass, his eyes become fixed on the opposite platform where he observes the serene figure of Professor Dumbledore standing poised in front of a large Divine Magic Perfume billboard. With a fond smile on his face, Harry confidently crosses over and gently takes hold of Dumbledore's left arm. Notably, he observes the professor's hand, blackened and adorned with rings, as they both spin away to appear suddenly on a bustling street. Dumbledore, with his left arm protectively around Harry, guides him adeptly through a throng of photographers whose cameras flash incessantly. As they walk purposefully past an ancient market cross, they continue down a dimly lit street, stopping with intention outside a solitary detached house.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: As lightning theatrically flashes across the darkened skies, it dramatically illuminates a sinister, skull-shaped cloud moving with ominous intent over the busy and ever-active City of London. This eerie and unsettling spectacle casts foreboding, stormy reflections on the glassy surface of a towering office building. Inside the building, anxious and concerned staff members peer out of the windows in alarm, watching the intimidating clouds approach with a palpable sense of growing unease and trepidation. The dark and foreboding clouds ominously produce three sinister, smoky trails that swoop menacingly toward the winding River Thames and the historic and iconic Trafalgar Square. They then sweep swiftly past the well-known Leicester Square tube station, snaking their way through the narrow, shadowy alleys and phasing effortlessly through solid walls into the magical realm of Diagon Alley. Here, the chaotic scene intensifies as the clouds ignite a shop, causing injuries to unsuspecting bystanders, while Death Eaters emerge from the shadows, sinister and threatening, holding a captive man whose head is obscured by a bag. Two of the Death Eaters wear cold, emotionless metal masks, while the third, with a long, somber face and a beard, adds to the overall menacing and threatening scene. The trio of Death Eaters then rapidly zooms away, skillfully weaving over the iconic and picturesque Millennium Bridge, which begins to tilt precariously, sway violently, and, ultimately, crashes catastrophically into the River Thames below. This dramatic and catastrophic collapse flings people helplessly into the water, leaving only haunting trails of smoke rising eerily from the disrupted river's surface. Meanwhile, at the quieter and more peaceful Surbiton Railway Station, an attractive waitress offers a charming and friendly smile to the world-famous Harry Potter. With a face notably marked by blood, Harry lowers his newspaper and sniffs his own breath as if checking it; then, he casually pops a mint into his mouth as he watches a train pass by. As he wipes away the condensation from the glass, his eyes become fixed on the opposite platform, where he observes the serene and calm figure of Professor Dumbledore standing poised in front of a large and eye-catching Divine Magic Perfume billboard. With a fond and affectionate smile on his face, Harry confidently crosses over and gently takes hold of Dumbledore's left arm. Notably, he observes and takes in the sight of the professor's hand, which is blackened and adorned with rings, as they both spin away to suddenly appear on a bustling and active street. Dumbledore, with his left arm protectively around Harry, skillfully guides him through the throng of photographers whose cameras are flashing incessantly. As they walk purposefully past an ancient and historic market cross, they continue down a dimly lit street, stopping with clear intention outside a solitary detached house.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As lightning intermittently illuminates the skies, it reveals a skull-shaped cloud ominously advancing over the City of London. The cloud casts stormy reflections onto the windows of a towering office building, where the staff inside, their faces etched with concern and alarm, peer out at the menacing clouds approaching from a distance. Within these dark clouds, three distinct trails of smoke begin to form, swirling and descending swiftly towards the iconic landmarks of the city, including the Thames and Trafalgar Square. The trails, like shadows darting across the landscape, rush past Leicester Square tube station, navigating through the narrow alleys with uncanny precision. Defying physical barriers, they penetrate through walls, spiraling into the magical confines of Diagon Alley with a sudden ferocity that ignites a shop and causes injuries to unsuspecting bystanders. Amidst the chaos, the enigmatic figures known as Death Eaters emerge, one of whom has a man draped with a bag over his head. Two of the Death Eaters are masked in imposing metal, while the third reveals a long face adorned with a beard. In a fluid motion, they disappear, whisking away through the air and deftly maneuvering over the Millennium Bridge. The bridge trembles, its structure violently tilting and swaying until it ultimately succumbs, crashing into the Thames below. The impact sends people careening into the water, with only trails of smoke left to rise eerily from the river’s surface. Meanwhile, at Surbiton Railway Station, a pretty waitress bestows a smile on Harry Potter, whose face, marked by fresh streaks of blood, emerges as he lowers a newspaper. He briefly sniffs his own breath with a touch of self-consciousness and discreetly pops a mint into his mouth. His attention then shifts to the train passing by, its motion drawing his gaze. As he wipes the condensation off the glass window beside him, his eyes are naturally drawn to the opposite platform, where, standing prominently in front of a Divine Magic Perfume billboard, is none other than Professor Dumbledore. Harry’s somber expression shifts to one of warmth as he smiles in recognition and promptly crosses over to join Dumbledore. He reaches out and gently holds Dumbledore's left arm, his eyes noticing the peculiar sight of the blackened hand and rings. The pair, bonded in a shared purpose, spin away from the scene, reappearing seamlessly on the street. With Dumbledore’s left arm wrapped supportively around Harry’s shoulders, they navigate through a throng of photographers, cameras flashing in rapid succession to capture the moment. As they continue their journey, they pass by a venerable market cross and proceed down a foreboding dark street, eventually halting their steps in front of an isolated detached house, a destination cloaked in mystery and significance.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: As lightning flashes behind a skull-shaped cloud advancing over the City of London, its stormy reflections cast an ominous glow on a tall office building, where alarmed staff watch the menacing clouds produce three dark smoke trails. These trails swoop past landmarks like the Thames, Trafalgar Square, and Leicester Square tube station, before penetrating narrow alleys and walls into Diagon Alley, igniting a shop and injuring people. Death Eaters, two in metal masks and one with a long face and beard, emerge with a man whose head is covered, then swiftly escape, weaving over the Millennium Bridge until it collapses into the Thames, leaving trails of smoke rising from the river. Meanwhile, at Surbiton Railway Station, a pretty waitress smiles at Harry Potter, who, with a bloodied face, sets down a paper, freshens his breath with a mint, and watches a train pass by. After wiping condensation from the glass, he spots Professor Dumbledore across the platform, standing by a Divine Magic Perfume billboard. Harry smiles, crosses over to join Dumbledore, noticing his blackened hand and rings as they vanish from the station. Dumbledore guides Harry through a throng of photographers and down a dark street, stopping outside a detached house.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Lightning flashes behind a skull-shaped cloud, reminiscent of the Dark Mark symbol used by dark wizards, as it moves forward over the City of London, a major financial district known for its iconic skyline and historic buildings, casting stormy reflections on a tall office building, where staff watch in alarm as the menacing clouds approach. The clouds produce three dark trails of smoke, similar to the movement of dark wizards traveling, that swoop toward the Thames, a historic river running through London, and Trafalgar Square, a famous public square known for its statues and fountains, then swiftly move past Leicester Square tube station, a popular stop for theater-goers, down narrow alleys and through walls into Diagon Alley, a hidden magical shopping area behind the Leaky Cauldron, igniting a shop and injuring people, as Death Eaters, followers of the dark wizard Voldemort, leave holding a man with a bag over his head. Two wear metal masks, a common accessory for these dark wizards to conceal their identities, while the third has a long face and beard. They zoom away and weave over the Millennium Bridge, a modern pedestrian bridge known for its unique design, which tilts, sways, and ultimately crashes into the Thames, flinging people and leaving only trails of smoke rising from the river. At Surbiton Railway Station, a suburban station southwest of London, a pretty waitress smiles at Harry Potter, a famous young wizard known for his role in defeating dark forces, whose bloodied face appears as he puts down a paper, sniffs his breath, pops a mint into his mouth, and watches a train pass. Wiping condensation from the glass, his eyes fix on the opposite platform where he sees Professor Dumbledore, the revered headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, standing in front of a Divine Magic Perfume billboard, a fictional brand known for its enchanting scents. Harry smiles, crosses over, and holds Dumbledore's left arm, noticing his blackened hand, a mysterious injury that has been the subject of much speculation, and rings as they spin away to a street. Dumbledore, with his left arm around Harry, leads him through a crowd of photographers flashing their cameras, likely eager to capture an image of the famous duo, and as they walk past a market cross, a traditional public space for announcements, they continue down a dark street, stopping outside a detached house, which stands isolated among the city landscape.

test_cases.description: Lightning flashes behind a skullshaped cloud as it moves forward over the City of London casting stormy reflections on a tall office building where staff watch in alarm as the menacing clouds approach. The clouds produce three dark trails of smoke that swoop toward the Thames and Trafalgar Square then swiftly move past Leicester Square tube station down narrow alleys and through walls into Diagon Alley igniting a shop and injuring people as Death Eaters leave holding a man with a bag over his head. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Wiping condensation from the glass his eyes fix on the opposite platform where he sees Professor Dumbledore standing in front of a Divine Magic Perfume billboard. Harry smiles crosses over and holds Dumbledore's left arm noticing his blackened hand and rings as they spin away to a street. Dumbledore with his left arm around. Harry leads him through a crowd of photographers flashing their cameras. and as they walk past a market cross they continue down a dark street stopping outside a detached house.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Thunderboom echoes behind a dragon-shaped balloon as it drifts backward over the Kingdom of Atlantis, casting shadowy refractions on a short library tower, where visitors cheer in delight as the playful balloons retreat. The balloons emit three bright streams of confetti that flutter toward the Nile and Times Square, then slowly drift past Central Park subway station, up wide boulevards and over rooftops into Dessert Alley, illuminating a bakery and delighting pedestrians, as Forest Rangers enter carrying a rabbit with a ribbon around his waist. Two wear velvet hats, while the third has a wide smile and whiskers. They stroll away and glide under the Golden Gate Bridge, which bends, twists, and eventually topples into the Nile, scattering fish and leaving only trails of confetti floating above the surface. At Gotham Bus Terminal, a grumpy librarian frowns at Sherlock Holmes, whose muddy boots appear as he picks up a magazine, scratches his nose, drops a candy into his pocket, and observes a car drive by. Clearing frost from the mirror, his gaze rests on the adjacent sidewalk where he notices Professor Moriarty lounging beside a Galactic Gadget Cologne poster. Sherlock frowns, strolls over, and taps Moriarty's right shoulder, noting his glowing wristwatch and bracelets as they dance away to a beach. Moriarty, with his right shoulder nudging Sherlock, guides him through a throng of dancers clicking their fingers, and as they shuffle past a fountain square, they continue up a bright avenue, pausing inside a sprawling mansion.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Lightning illuminates a skull-shaped cloud over London, casting ominous shadows as office staff watch. The cloud releases dark smoke trails that swoop through the city, causing chaos in Diagon Alley as Death Eaters abduct a man. Wearing metal masks and a long beard, they flee, causing the Millennium Bridge to collapse into the Thames. Meanwhile, at Surbiton Railway Station, waitress smiles at Harry Potter, who cleans up and freshens his breath as he notices Professor Dumbledore across the platform. Harry joins Dumbledore, who has a blackened hand, and they spin away together to a street. Dumbledore guides Harry through a crowd and down a dark street, stopping at a detached house.
